name: Application for Driving License
description:
This service allows Rwanda citizens who passed the provisional driving test to request their
supplementary driving license. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 14 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for Driving License
description: The e-provisional license is an e-document issued on IremboGov certifying that a citizen  has passed their provisional driving test. This service allows Rwandan citizens of age or a foreigner with a resident ID who passed the provisional driving test to request, pay, and have their e-provisional license generated. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for Driving License
description: This service allows Rwanda citizens who passed the definitive driving test to request their definitive driving license. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 50000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 14 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Registration for Driving Test
description: This service allows Rwandans to register for a definitive driving license test. It  is a practical test to evaluate the applicant's abilitity to drive a motor vehicle. The minimum age to attend this test is 18 years. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Registration for Driving Test
description:
This Service allows users to register for a supplementary practical driving test. The purpose of
the test is to test the person's ability to drive the vehicle specific to the additional category he/she is seeking. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Registration for Driving Test
description: This services allows users to register for provisional driving test. This test is done in writing or online. Tests are in 3 languages: Kinyarwanda, English and French by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Registration for Driving Test
description: This service allows applicants to register provisional driving license test. The aim of this test is to evaluate the applicant's theoretical knowledge to drive a motor vehicle. Tests are done on a computer. Tests can be in Kinyarwanda, English, or French. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Driving License Exam Results
description: This service allows users to check their provisional, definitive and supplementary driving test results using the exam code. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 0 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Renewal of Driving License
description: This service allows Rwanda citizens to renew their definitive driving license. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Renewal of Driving License
description: This service allows Rwanda citizens to renew their provisional driving license. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 21 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Duplicate of Driving License
description:
This service allows citizens to replace their definitive driving
licenses when lost or damaged. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 25000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 21 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Traffic Fines
description: This serviceallows users to pay for traffic fines using the contravention number. The contravention number is issued to a driver who has made infractions to traffic and road safety laws. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Replacement of Definitive Driving License
description:
This service allows Rwanda
 Citizens who hold a foreign driving license (or an old national driving license) to register for a driving test in order to obtain an equivalent Rwanda Driving License. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 50000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 14 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Motor Vehicle Inspection
description: This service allows individuals or companies to book an appointment at a motor vehicle inspection center and to pay for the inspection of their motor vehicles. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Motor Vehicle Inspection
description:
This service allows companies to deposit an amount that will be used to pay for any motor vehicle inspection
related service for the company cars. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Motor Vehicle Inspection
description: This service allows individuals & companies to replace their MotorVehicle Inspection Certificate when lost or damaged. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Correction of Driving License
description: This service enables driving license holders to correct information on their licenses. To determine eligibility for the correction, applicants must first visit the Rwanda National Police BUSANZA office (Department of Testing and Licensing) or email tlcustomerservice@police.gov.rw or call 118. Once the Rwanda National Police approves the correction request, applicants can proceed to Irembo to submit their application and complete the payment. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 25000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 14 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Correction of Driving License
description: This service enables provisional driving license holders to correct information on their license. To determine eligibility for the correction, applicants must first visit the Rwanda National Police BUSANZA office (Department of Testing and Licensing) or email tlcustomerservice@police.gov.rw or call 118. Once the Rwanda National Police approves the correction request, applicants can proceed to Irembo to submit their application and make the necessary payment. by Polisi y'u Rwanda for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Nationality
description: The certificate of nationality is issued to a Rwandan citizen to confirm his/her nationality as Rwandan. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Being Alive
description: The certificate of life is granted to a Rwandan citizen to certify that he is alive. The application is processed by local authorities at Sector level. This document is valid for three months. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate for Replacement of National Identity Card
description: The Certificate for the loss of Identity card is issued to Rwandan citizens to act as a temporary ID to use while they wait for the new national card. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 3000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Full Identity
description: This service allows Rwandans to apply for Certificate of Full Identity. It can serve as one of the supporting documents for the application of services such as to register for primary and secondary school national exams; military registration/recruitment, visa application, etc. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Change of name
description: This service allows  Rwandan citizens to initiate the official name change request. The user will get a change request approval letter that the applicant will use to publish in the official gazette and in the media. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Change of name
description: This service allows Rwandan citizens to request the confirmation of their official change of names. The user will get a change request notice that they will use to be updated in different registries. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 20000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for National ID Correction
description: This service enables Rwandans to apply for the correction of their National Identity Cards. The citizen will receive an appointment requesting him\her to visit the selected sector and show supporting documents to justify their reason for the request. The corrected ID will be picked at his/her sector of registration. For more info: info@nida.gov.rw by Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Indangamuntu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for National ID Correction
description: This service enables Rwandans living abroad to apply for the correction of their National Identity Cards. by Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Indangamuntu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for National ID
description: This service allows a diaspora applicant to apply for a National ID and an NPR number. A National ID is a document that officially identifies an adult as a citizen of Rwanda. An NPR application number is the number that identifies any Rwandan in the National Population Registry, and having one is required to apply for a National ID.  by Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Indangamuntu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for National ID
description: This service enables Rwanda citizens to apply for a national ID. The applicant must have an application number in NIDA offices. A citizen who does not have the application number should carry any Identification and reach out the nearest sector office to request it from the Civil Registration officer (CRO) before applying for the National ID. For any more information, visit: info@nida.gov.rw by Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Indangamuntu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for National ID
description: This service enables Rwandan citizens to pay for their national IDs. A citizen who does not have their national identification number should carry any Identification and reach out to the nearest sector office to request it from the Civil Registration officer (CRO). For any more information, visit: info@nida.gov.rw by Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Indangamuntu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: National ID Replacement
description: This service enables Rwandans or Refugees to replace their National ID, if they have lost or damaged its. The applicant may apply for a temporary ID while waiting for the new ID to be produced. This will require an additional 3000 FRW. This document is only valid for 60 days. For more info: info@nida.gov.rw by Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Indangamuntu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: National ID Replacement
description: This service enables Rwandans abroad to apply and replace their National ID, if they have lost or damaged it. by Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Indangamuntu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Title Transfer
description: This service allows land owners to transfer rights of their land to someone else ordered by a court order. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Title Transfer
description: This service allows land owners to transfer their land title to someone else bazed on succession. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Title Transfer
description: This service allows land owners to transfer their land title to someone else as a donation. by National Land Authority for 1000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Title Transfer
description: This service allows land owners to exchange rights of their land. by National Land Authority for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Title Transfer
description: This service allows land owners to transfer rights of their land to a new owner. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Land Merging
description: This service allows land owners to apply for land merging for two or more adjacent parcels into one parcel. After a successful processing of this application one land document for the new parcel is generated. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Subdivision
description: This service allows land owner to apply for subdividing one parcel into smaller one. After a successful processing of this application, new plot documents for each subdivided  parcel will be provided to replace the previous document. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Subdivision
description: This application is for parcel subdivision of agricultural land held in co-ownership. After a successful processing of this application, new plot documents for each subdivided parcel will be provided to replace the previous document. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Change of Land Use
description: This service allows land owners to align their land's use with the latest version of the city's master plan. A successful application results into a new land document with an updated land use. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Title Details Update
description: This service allows land owners to modify details of their land title: NID, names, representatives, owners. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Title Details Update
description: This service allows applicants to update their land information in the land registry. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Sporadic Registration
description: This service allows land owners whose parcels were not registered during the systematic land registration to get their parcel(s) registered. A successful application results into a new land document with the latest standards. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Authentication for Loan Agreement
description: This services allows applicants who wish to avail their parcel as collateral to another party for a loan. A successful application results into a land collaterall document. by National Land Authority for 1000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rectification of Boundaries and Area Correction
description: The Rectification of Boundaries and Area Correction service enables land owners to request adjustments to their property boundaries and area measurements. Once the lands are rectified, new e-titles are produced. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 25 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Registration of condominium and split of condominium
description: This service facilitates associations and companies in registering and splitting condominium units within buildings or properties. It streamlines the process of converting buildings into condominium units, ensuring efficiency in registration and division. Upon completion, applicants have the convenience of downloading condominium unit titles. by National Land Authority for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 8 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Purchase an Official Gazette
description: This service enables applicants to purchase the official gazette. Applicants will apply and pay for the gazette, then gazettes will be delivered to the applicants’ respective addresses. Applicants can purchase a copy or several copies of a gazette every time a new gazette is out. Processing Time: 1 Day ,Price : Depends on documents. by Ministry of Justice for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Publish in the Official Gazette
description: This service enables applicants who want to publish in the official gazette to pay after being granted permission to do so. The publications paid for are for a change of name granted by MINALOC, Legal personality of NGOs and FBOs granted by RGB and Legal personality for cooperatives granted by RCA.Publication types:- Change of name,-Legal personality, Processing Time: 14 Days, Price : Depends on documents by Ministry of Justice for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 14 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Various Notary Services
description: This service allows applicants who have different documents that they need to notarize to apply and pay for Notary services. There are different locations that notarize documents in Rwanda: MINIJUST: all documents that are specifically going out of the country. RDB: all documents that are related to businesses, Foreigners and Investments within Rwanda. RGB: all documents used applying for services at Rwanda Governance Board. District/sector Notary: all documents that are used within Rwanda by Ministry of Justice for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Community Based Health Insurance(Mutuelle)
description: This service allows Rwandans to pay Community Based Health Insurance (Mutuelle) for their household. by Ikigo cy'Ubwiteganyirize mu Rwanda for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Yellow fever vaccination
description: This service enables applicants to book a time slot at Rwanda biomedical center in Gikondo to get a yellow fever vaccination. by Rwanda Biomedical Center for 15000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: COVID-19 Test
description: This service enables applicants to book a time slot to get tested at Rwanda Biomedical Center's designated COVID-19 testing sites. by Rwanda Biomedical Center for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: COVID-19 Test
description: This service enables applicants to book a time slot to get tested at Rwanda Biomedical Center's designated COVID-19 testing sites. by Rwanda Biomedical Center for 0 United States dollar. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Laboratory tests
description: This service allows you to pay for your laboratory tests and provide proof of payment. by Rwanda Biomedical Center for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This service is offered to entities that have successfully concluded the inspection process, receiving a favorable inspection recommendation to commence operations. This marks the pivotal stage for a private health facility to initiate its services. Following a comprehensive evaluation and meeting all regulatory criteria, the entity is now eligible to proceed with the application for a license to operate. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This application allows health facilities to elevate their health facility category. Accessible to health facilities holding a valid operating license, this service facilitates the process of upgrading the categorization of healthcare services provided. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This service is designed for health facilities seeking to cease their operations. Upon approval, this entails the cancellation of the facility's operating license. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This service is provided to entities with valid operating licenses and who want to relocate the facility. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This service caters to health facilities seeking a transition in their management. Whether prompted by evolving needs, organizational restructuring, or strategic considerations. The applicant should possess a valid operating license. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This authorization is granted to entities intending to establish a new health facility. It serves as the initial step preceding the application for a license to operate. Notably, this authorization holds no expiration date, providing applicants with the flexibility to proceed with the subsequent licensing process at their convenience. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This service is sought by an entity holding provisional authorization for the registration of a health facility. The entity is now prepared for a thorough inspection as part of the preparatory phase before formally applying for a license to operate. This inspection serves as a pivotal step in ensuring that the health facility aligns with regulatory standards and requirements. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This is the service that is provided to entities with valid license to operate and who want to renew their existing license. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This service is specifically tailored for health facilities possessing a valid operating license and aiming to augment their service offerings. It caters to the requirements of health facilities aspiring to introduce supplementary services, thereby enriching the spectrum of healthcare options available within the facility. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Health facility licensing
description: This service is provided to private health facilities that currently have their paper-based licenses and want to convert them to a digital format. by Ministry of Health for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 10 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for Equating Foreign Qualifications
description: This service enables people who attended their higher education from foreign institute to apply for the equivalency certificate from the Rwandan Higher Education system. by Higher Education Council for 1000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for Equating Foreign Qualifications - General Education
description: This service enables people who attended their general education (primary and secondary) from foreign institutes to apply for the equivalency certificate from the National Examination and School Inspection Authority. by National Examination and School Inspection Authority for 1000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Foreign Equivalency Certification for TVET

description: This is a service given to International NGOs, National NGOs and Private companies (corporate social responsibilities interventions)willing to sign MOUs with the Ministry of Education for them to intervene in the development of Education in Rwanda. by Ministry of Education for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 2 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Recommendation for importation of used IT equipment
description: This service is given to schools and other educational institutions that need to import used IT equipment for education purposes. by Ministry of Education for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Issuance of Recommendation Letter to NGO by MINEDUC
description: This service is to issue recommendation letters to international NGO operating in Rwanda under the ministry of education. by Ministry of Education for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 5 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: ECD Accreditation certificate
description: This service helps to request a certificate to establish an Early Childhood Development (ECD). This application is processed by local government authorities. The applicant is granted a certificate allowing them to establish an ECD. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Transport Authorization
description: This service allows motorcyclists to request for a transport authorization. by PUBLIC for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Transport Authorization
description: This service allows motorcyclists to renew their transport authorization. by PUBLIC for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Transport License

name: Transport License
description: This service allowsmotorcyclists to renew their Transport License by PUBLIC for 400000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: VAT Exemption
description: This service allows local manufacturers, assemblers, and miners to get value-added tax exemptions for raw materials, capital goods, and machinery. Applicants must submit a duly completed list of the raw materials, capital goods, or machinery used to make their final products. You will need to use the template provided in the application form to fill in the details. by Ministry of trade and industry for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 21 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

description: This service facilitates the import of commodities by obtaining necessary import permits. Import conditions are set based on risk analysis conducted. description: The Rwanda Investigation Bureau(RIB) issues the Criminal investigation clearance certificate to someone who is not being investigated or previously investigated for any crime. Only applicants with a Rwandan ID or passport number are eligible. by Rwanda Investigation Bureau for 1200 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Clearance certificate to transfer a deceased body abroad
description: This service facilitates the acquisition of a clearance certificate, enabling the transfer of a deceased individual's body from Rwanda to their home country for burial. The applicant submits the necessary information and documents to the Rwanda Investigation Bureau (RIB) for review and processing. by Rwanda Investigation Bureau for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Good conduct
description: The certificate is issued to individuals living or who have previously lived in Rwanda to ascertain that they exhibit good community conduct. by Rwanda Investigation Bureau for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Lost and theft certificate
description: This service provides assistance in obtaining Lost and Theft Certificates for individuals or companies that have experienced the loss or theft of their valuable possessions (documents, various items, etc.). The application is sent to the nearest RIB station for evaluation and processing. The document is valid for 1 month. by Rwanda Investigation Bureau for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: INTERPOL-KIGALI Motor Vehicle Clearance
description: This service is requested by an Individual or a company that wants to relocate a motor vehicle outside Rwanda. This certificate has a validity of 1 month. by Rwanda Investigation Bureau for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 10 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Fingerprint Certificate
description: The fingerprint certificate is issued to individuals who have been requested to provide this certificate by an embassy or any other institution. The application is then submitted to the RIB administration for review and approval. by Rwanda Investigation Bureau for 1200 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Recommendation Letter for VAT Exemption
description: This service, offered by MINAGRI, facilitates individual farmers, farmers cooperatives, registered farming companies and other stakeholders in obtaining recommendation letter for VAT exemptions on their imported agricultural and livestock products. This issued letter certifies the eligibility of the products for VAT exemption and serves as a supporting document for requesting VAT exemptions from the relevant authorities. by Ministry of Agriculture and Animal Resources for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Recommendation Letter to NGOs in Agriculture Sector
description: This service aims to provide recommendation letters specifically tailored for local and international NGOs operating within Rwanda and falling under the purview of the Ministry of Agriculture and Animal Resources. by Ministry of Agriculture and Animal Resources for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 5 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Purchase the bovine semen
description: This RAB service facilitates the collection of Bovine Semen, allowing both district public or private veterinarians to procure Bovine Semen directly from RAB stations. Through this channel, the Service allows also private Veterinarians to purchase Bovine Semen from Districts. by Ikigo cy'Igihugu cy'Ubuhinzi for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 2 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Livestock Relocation
description: This service enables citizens to relocate livestock between sectors and districts. Sector veterinary authorities approve relocations within sectors, district veterinary authorities oversee district-to-district moves within Rwanda. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Accreditation for Foreign Media
description: This service allows foreign media to apply and pay for accreditation in order to exercise their profession of journalism in Rwanda. by Rwanda Media Council for 0 United States dollar. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application for Photography and Video Shooting Permit
description: This service allows Rwandan and foreign production companies and individuals to shoot images and videos in public for documentary and fiction film productions. This permission does not exempt the filming crew of necessary formalities when requested by local authorities on the field and requesting authorisation for drones and special materials. by Ministry of Youth and Arts for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 4 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Application and Payment of National Flag
description: This service allows individuals, companies and organizations who need to get new national flag(s). This service is processed by local Government. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Request for travel clearance during Umuganda
description: This service is designed to assist individuals or groups who need to travel during Umuganda for reasons such as funeral services, emergency meetings, commemoration of the genocide against Tutsi, or any other urgent reasons. The service can be requested through Ministry of Local Government (MINALOC) by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Fireworks Import Permit
description: This service is offered by the Ministry of Interior (MININTER) to companies for importation of fireworks. This service aims to regulate the safe importation of fireworks within the jurisdiction. by Ministry of Interior for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Authorization to display fireworks
description: This service is offered by the Ministry of Interior (MININTER) to businesses involved in the usage (Display) of fireworks. This service aims to regulate the safe Usage of fireworks within the jurisdiction. by Ministry of Interior for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Blasting materials import permit
description: The Ministry of Interior (MININTER) offers this service to individuals and businesses intending to import dynamites for the purpose of mining and quarrying within the country. This service is designed to facilitate the importation of dynamites while ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations and laws governing the use and handling of explosives. by Ministry of Interior for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 90 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Blasting materials usage permit
description: The Ministry of Interior offers this service to individuals and businesses that intend to use or utilise dynamites in Rwanda. by Ministry of Interior for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: NCST Conference Registration
description: This service enables applicants to register for the 2nd Rwanda STI Conference 2024 under the theme: "Promoting Climate Resilient Agriculture through Science, Technology, and Innovation for Improved Food Security and Nutrition" organized by the National Council for Science and Technology (NCST) in collaboration with national and international partners. Applicants must pay registration fees and it will cover conference attendance, coffee/tea breaks, lunch each day, a welcome reception dinner, and a conference package. If exhibitors from the same institution are more than one, others will apply for waiver. by National Council for Science and Technology for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 2 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Birth Services
description: This eService allows Rwandans to apply for a birth record certificate. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level where the applicant is registered. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Birth Services
description: This service allows Rwandans to apply for a Birth Certificate. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Marriage Services
description: The marriage Certificate is the official document that identifies that a couple is legally married. The application will be submitted to local government authorities at the sector level for processing where the marriage has been celebrated. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Marriage Services
description:
This service allows citizens and foreigners residing in Rwanda to register for a legal marriage. Engaged couples register to be married before the law 21 days before the legal marriage takes place. If there are no objections, the couple marries and sector officials provide a Marriage Record.

Legal marriage on Thursdays is provided free of charge while on other days after the couple gets the confirmation of the availability of the Executive Secretary of the sector it is 50,000 Rwf. Citizens can go to their processing office sector to reschedule their date of legal marriage in case their application is rejected. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Marriage Services
description: The Marriage Record certificate is the official document that identifies a legally married couple. The application is either automatically processed by the CRVS system or manually processed by local government authorities at the sector level, who confirm that the information provided for the Marriage Record is correct. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Death Services
description: A Death Record Certificate is an official document that confirms a person is dead. The application is either automatically processed by the CRVS system or manually processed by local government authorities at the sector level who confirm that the death has been previously registered and that the information provided for the Death Record is correct. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Death Services
description: This eService allows the user to apply for Death Registration. The application will be submitted to the civil registration officer of a sector where the deceased was registered. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Death Services
description: A death record is an official document that declares a person is dead. The application is processed by local government authorities at the sector level where the deceased was registered. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Adoption Record
description: This service allows the user to apply for an Adoption record. The application is either automatically processed by the CRVS system or manually processed by local government authorities at the sector level, who confirm that the information provided for the Adoption Record is correct. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Record of Recognition
description: This service allows the user to apply for a record of recognition of a child. Once the application is processed, the user will receive the record of recognition certificate. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Succession
description: The Certificate of Succession is given to Rwandan citizens that had succeeded a deceased member of the family.  It is processed by the sector which the deceased resided in. Form 7 and Form 29 (for land matters) can be found at the sector. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Cohabitation
description: The Certificate of cohabitation is issued to foreigners legally married to Rwandan citizens living in Rwanda. This allows a foreigner to apply for a Rwandan Nationality. Also, Rwandan citizens can use the certificate to claim for services in their spouse's country of origin (i.e. Visa, children's registration or apply for nationality). by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate for Widow/Widower
description: The Certificate of being a widow or widower is a signed confirmation given to Rwandan citizens whose spouses are deceased. This document confirms the civil status of the person requesting the certificate. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Residence
description: The Certificate of residence certifies where the person resides at the moment of application. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector of residence. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Genocide Survivors
description: The certificate of Genocide Survival is a certificate issued by the cell to genocide survivors upon request to be used as a supporting document in order to give them access to the Assistance Fund for Genocide Survivors (Fonds d'Assistance aux rescapes du genocide, FARG) by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Being Single
description: This certificate is the official document that declares that an individual is single. It can be used to apply for services like legal marriage registration, bank loan, insurance, etc. The application is processed by local Government authorities at the sector level. This document has a validity of three months. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Divorce Services
description: The Divorce Record is issued to Rwandan citizens who have undergone the process of cancelling their marriage. It is a confirmation of one's civil status as "Divorced". It is either automatically processed by the CRVS system or manually processed by local government authorities at the sector level, upon issuance of a copy of the court judgment which confirms that the person is divorced. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Divorce Services
description: The Certificate of Divorce is issued to Rwandans who have undergone the process of annulling their marriage. The certificate is a confirmation of one’s civil status as Divorced after the judgment is passed by a court of law. The certificate is issued at the sector office upon issuance of a copy of the court judgment, which confirms that the married couple has divorced. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Authentication for an orphan's status
description: This service offers an official verification or confirmation of the orphan status to citizens. by Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Certificate of Needy Survivor of the Genocide Perpetrated against the Tutsi in 1994
description: This service provides a certificate to survivors of the 1994 Genocide against the Tutsi. The certificate serves as an essential document for survivors when applying for various forms of support and assistance offered by the Ministry of National Unity & Civic Engagement. by Ministry of National Unity & Civic Engagement for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Guardianship Record
description:
This service allows the user to apply for a guardianship record. The application will be submitted to the civil registration office of the sector where the event was registered for those whose guardianship was registered before July 2023 
 However, those whose guardianship was registered after July 2023 will proceed with payment to get the record. by Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Indangamuntu for 1500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Gender and Family Promotion MoUs
description: This service allows Public , Private institutions, Academia, Civil Society organizations,international & local organization, and Faith-Based Organizations working in the areas related to the MIGEPROF mandate to apply for MIGEPROF MoU (Memorandum of Understanding). This Memorandum of Understanding has a 1 year validity period. by Ministry of Gender and Family Promotion for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Gender and Family Promotion MoUs
description: This service enables all applicants with expired MoU certificates to obtain a renewal certificate. by Ministry of Gender and Family Promotion for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 30 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Recommendation Letter for Persons with Disabilities
description: This service is designed to help persons with disabilities to get recommendation letter which will facilitate them in all activities and enhance their well-being. by National Council of Persons with Disabilities for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 2 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: e-Passport Application
description: This service allows Rwandans to replace their Rwanda East Africa electronic passport (issued from the 28 June, 2019) in case of loss, theft, damage or expiry. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 4 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: e-Passport Application
description: This service allows Rwandans to apply for the most recent Rwanda East Africa electronic passport issued by DGIE from 28 June 2019. The Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration issues three types of passports: ordinary, service, and diplomatic passports.  You are eligible to apply for this service if:  1. You will be a first-time holder of a Rwandan passport.  or  2. You are replacing or renewing a passport, and the type of passport that you are replacing is the discontinued, dark blue passport, issued by DGIE before 28 June 2019. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 4 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Laissez-passer
description: This service allows Rwandans to replace their lost or damaged laissez-passer. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Laissez-passer
description: This service allows Rwandans to request a Laissez-passer. A Laissez-Passer is issued to all Rwandans who intend to travel to the following countries:  Burundi, Democratic Republic of Congo, Kenya, Tanzania, Uganda, and South Sudan upon fulfilling requirements. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 3 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Laissez-passer
description: This service allows Rwandans to renew their expired laissez-passer. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 2 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Visa Application
description: This service allows users to apply for a visa. In Rwanda, an entry visa can be applied online or on arrival for citizens coming from anywhere in the world. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 United States dollar. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Visa Application
description: This service allows users to renew their visa. The visa application will be received and processed by DGIE officers. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 United States dollar. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Permits
description: This service allows users to apply for a permit. The permit is applied when the applicant has already arrived in Rwanda. Permits allow investors, entrepreneurs, and international workers to operate in Rwanda. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Permits
description: This service allows users to renew their permits. The permit application will be received and processed by DGIE officers. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Foreigner ID Card
description: This service allows foreigners residing in Rwanda to renew their foreigner ID to use in Rwanda. Foreigners with valid permits are eligible to get the foreigner Id. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Foreigner ID Card
description: This service allows foreigners residing in Rwanda to apply for a foreigner ID to use in Rwanda. Foreigners with valid permits are eligible to get the foreigner Id. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Foreigner Travel Document
description: This service allows foreigners to request an emergency travel document. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Pay for Transfer/Transcription Fees
description: This service allows users to pay transcription/transfer fees. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 18050 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Penalty Payments
description: This service allows users to pay for penalties. These penalties include administrative, transport, travel documents, visas, and permits penalties. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: DPA payment
description:
This service allows rwandans above 16 years old, living abroad and without national ID to pay for an e-passport requested at their embassy.
To pay for this service, citizens need a valid reference number delivered by DGIE after the initial application process at the embassy. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: CEPGL Services
description: This service allows Rwandans or foreigners residing in Rwanda to replace a CEPGL travel document in case they have lost it or it has been damaged or stolen. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 15000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: CEPGL Services
description: This service allows Rwandans or foreigners residing in Rwanda to request a CEPGL travel document. The document is used to travel within CEPGL member states which are Burundi and The DRC. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: CEPGL Services
description: This service allows Rwandans or foreigners residing in Rwanda to renew a CEPGL travel document. The document is used to travel within CEPGL member states which are Burundi and The DRC. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 1 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality
description: This service allows users to pay the fee that corresponds to an application for nationality renunciation. Nationality renunciation applications are submitted at DGIE (Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration) offices, at the Rwandan High Commission, or at Rwandan embassies. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 150000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 0 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality
description: This service allows users to pay fees that correspond to nationality applications. These payments include application fees and granting of nationality fees. Nationality applications are submitted at DGIE (Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration) offices, at the Rwandan High Commission, or at Rwandan embassies. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 500 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 0 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Permit and Visa Transfer
description: This service allows an applicant to apply online for a visa or permit transfer into a new passport. This application should be done by applicants who already have a valid Rwandan visa or permit and have had their passport lost, stolen, or damaged; or want to transfer a permit or visa from an expired passport into a new passport. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 18050 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 7 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Origin
description: A person who applies for the Rwandan nationality by origin must be born to at least one Rwandan parent who is a Rwandan not through acquisition but by virtue of Rwandan ancestry. Follow-up time: Three months after receipt of application. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 180 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Recovery of Rwandan Nationality
description: Only an applicant with a Rwandan nationality by origin can apply for the recovery of nationality, following renunciation. Follow up time: Six months after receipt of the application. by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 5000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 180 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
Rwandan nationality by acquisition on ground of birth on the territory of Rwanda is applied by a person born to foreigners who were legally residing in Rwanda at the time of his or her birth and who has attained age of majority by the date of application.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
Rwandan nationality by acquisition on ground of being an immigrant is granted to a person or her ascendant who has immigrated to Rwanda for social, political or economic reasons residing and physically living on the territory of Rwanda at least for twenty-five (25) years and have lost connection to his or her country of origin.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
Rwandan nationality by acquisition on ground of marriage is applied by a foreigner legally married to a Rwandan national for at least five (5) years on the date of application, still living in marital union with his or her spouse and being a person of integrity and of good conduct.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
Rwandan nationality by acquisition on ground of adoption is given to a foreign child who is adopted by a Rwandan and being not a threat to national security.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
Rwandan nationality by acquisition on ground of statelessness is granted to an applicant or beneficiary who is stateless on the territory of Rwanda on the date of application and not posing a threat to national security.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
Rwandan nationality by acquisition on ground of substantial and sustainable investment is granted to individuals who have made significant and lasting investments or engaged in activities within Rwanda. To qualify for this nationality, an applicant must possess a document issued by a relevant ministry, detailing his/her substantial and sustainable investment or activities in Rwanda, which serves as a justification for granting Rwandan nationality.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
Rwandan nationality by acquisition on ground of residing in Rwanda is granted to a person who has legally resided and physically lived on the territory of Rwanda for at least fifteen (15) years on the date of application and being characterized by integrity and good conduct.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
Rwandan nationality by acquisition on ground of national interest is a service given to individuals who prove to be of benefits to the country.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Rwandan Nationality by Acquisition
description:
To acquire Rwandan nationality based on special skills or talent, the applicant must possess unique skills or talents that are required in Rwanda. The applicant needs to provide a document issued by the relevant ministry, addressed to the Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration. This document should explain why the applicant's special skills or talent are essential for Rwanda and justify the granting of Rwandan nationality by acquisition.

Follow up time: Six months after reception of application by Ubuyobozi Bukuru bw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Gihugu for 10000 Rwanda Francs. It takes about None days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).

name: Authorization to access Refugee Camp
description: This service is provided to nationals, foreigners and refugees residing in Rwanda who want to visit refugee camps for different purposes. please note that Application to be done 3 days before arrival to the camp by Ministry in charge of Emergency Management for 0 Rwanda Francs. It takes about 5 days. This service can be applied for via Irembo (https://irembo.gov.rw).
